metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9790 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/mmc/core/debugfs.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-07-05 on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices does not validate pointers usedin read and write operations, which allows attackers to gain privileges viaa crafted application, aka Android internal bug 28769136 and Qualcomminternal bug CR545716.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
